attributes.action: Stop sky moving games to when it suits them Football is about the fans not money
attributes.additional_details:
Derby vs forest moved from 3pm to 1pm on 15th December to reduce problems around the ground. 

People make plans, change shifts at work to attend. 

Sky come along and move to the game to the 17thdecember Monday night. Forcing people to finish work early or even use a days holiday to get down in time for kick off!!
attributes.background: Why do sky have the power to move football games to suit them. Football is nothing without fans!
